website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use and heats evenly, but the unit tends to fail within a year of regular use.
pros: Simple to set up and use, and gets very hot for a press at this price point
Owners like the accurate temperature and good pressure provided
cons: Reports of machine heating becoming unreliable or failing completely after a few months of use
Handle can be tricky to unlock during use

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using it too long I've only done about 20 shirts. But so far so good! I was pressing vinyl on shirts with an iron and one 3 layered onesie would take about an hour AND the vinyl would shrink so it ended up not lining up well. Best $200 I've spent. I've cut pressing time by about 2000% so worth it if you have constant requests coming in! S/n: If you're wondering if it's a good choice or not I asked a family friend who owns a print shop to help me choose between this and two others and he said this was a good choice for price quality and size!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Must have for HTV
customer_reviews.text: I got a Silhoutte for Christmas and was loving my endless possibilities for custom t-shirts. However it seems no matter how focused and hard I tried to iron on the vinyl I would get peeling spots after washing. This heat press has made it so much easier to make shirts and I have not had an issue with peeling using multiple brands of vinyl on different types of fabrics. Highly recommend this heat press for anyone working with HTV!
customer_reviews.author: Mama_Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great heat press! Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I cranked out five shirts in the time it took me to do one with my iron!! Why did I wait so long to buy this?! I purchased the 15x15 because my husband is a 3XLT and his shirt designs are all 11.75" wide, so a smaller one wouldn't have sufficed. Extremely easy to use. Plugged it in, selected the temperature and time and that was IT! However.. when I have this on and it switches into heating up mode, my ceiling fan light dims. When it switches off, ceiling fan light goes bright again. It's on a normal wall socket.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear Bethay

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Great press! Arrived quickly! Sturdy frame and best price I could find for the size 15x15! I'm already spoiling my friends and family with t shirts and hoodies. I've only had it a few days but I'm in love. It was easy to set up (aka take out of box, set on a sturdy desk, and plug in) then setting the temp and time was super easy as well!
customer_reviews.author: H. Finney

customer_reviews.title: Get to know your machine
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I love this press. The digital temp setting reads hotter than what the actual Platen temp is. Ex: 331 on the digital readout is actually 320 at the platen, measured with a temp gun. The upper platen has quite a bit of variation in heat distribution. The front usually ranges from 5-8 degrees hotter than the back, when checking with my laser temp gun. This poses a challenge on larger transfers for even heat distribution. Once you get the specifics of the machine figured out, it is easy to use, and seems to give even pressure throughout. Overall, I won’t complain for the price. Great for starting out with your first heat press.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Titus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated. Timely delivery. Heavy. No damage. My only reason for 4 stars is because when using heavier pressure, the arm is difficult to open, which can potentially cause damage to the item. When attempting to open on heavy pressure, the whole thing lifts. I have to pull down on the protective sheet and lift the arm at the same time. My tip is start trying to open around three seconds remaining.
customer_reviews.author: KorterBegorter

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me, despite terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty well made. The instructions were horrible. It did come with a book that was in impossible to understand English rendering it worthless- however it’s not rocket science and there is YouTube. The press works great, easy to use controls, accurate timer. Really pleased so far
customer_reviews.author: Raspberry Wren

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this as my first heat press. I read several reviews and articles for weeks before buying one and debated if I should get one with a swing away arm or attachments but finally decided on this one and I have not been disappointed. It works great. I thought I would be scared of getting burned with it being clamshell but it really is easy to use. I am happy with this one
customer_reviews.author: maranda

customer_reviews.title: Quit extended warranty but not replaced
customer_reviews.text: Heat press quit bought extended warranty but still no replacement wasn't even a year old will not work and Assurion warranty is no good no one will replace even with 4 year warranty save you money Fancierstudio will not back or even get back to you
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Redger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & ready to use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been really impressed by this heat press. It’s sturdy, super easy to use, & has a great even press. This is not my first heat press, but wanted to go with a 15x15 this time & works perfectly for adult shirts!
customer_reviews.author: Jlg

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very impressed with this machine. Makes the work very easy to do and quickly. Heavy and built solid. I was able to do 6 cruise t-shirts within minutes. I purchased a 9x12 Fancierstudio over a year ago and constantly second guessed myself on the positioning of the vinyl. Now I can actually see and just wished I went with the 15x15 in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: It's ok if on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for the price definitely wish i would have gotten a better one tho, the pressure that I have to use seems like the handle is ready to snap at the bolt, the alignment is off amd there is like glue residue all over the side of the machine the temperature is not consistent throughout the plate either
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Heat isn't working.
customer_reviews.text: The heat on mine stopped working after 2 1/2 months. It's not getting hot enough. DO NOT BUY THIS. The return policy is only 30 days which is not fair, it should be atleast 90 days. I was happy at first but definitely not now.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Walker

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: This press came highly recommended. So far I like it much better than the previous press that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rappa

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase! Press has been used daily since I purchased and it has held up well so far under those circumstances 😊

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Products works great and easy to use! So happy I made this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about using it. I watched YouTube videos and printed a cheat sheet for the different types of HTV. I took an old shirt and tested different types of HTV. I was pleasantly surprised how easy it was. The heat press is definitely a game changer. I'm in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gerlack

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited when I got this. Instructions were hardy in English. From the start the display was a bit more difficult to set. Even after I figured how to set it the temperature was always wrong. Had it set to 310. Center was 308, one corner 289, one corner 340, another 320. Returned after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: k.sierra

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: I love this heat press. So long to my easy press and hello to constant pressure without the upper body workout. :)

customer_reviews.title: I bit the bullet & went with this one & I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews on heat presses & didn't feel confident with really any of them. I bit the bullet & went with this one & I'm glad I did. It has worked perfectly for me.

customer_reviews.title: Never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: This heat press never Disappoints my projects are always stuck on and perfect heats up quickly and is easy to store is a little bit heavy though

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have found this heat press to be extremely user friendly and a great value! It's so easy to use from the heat settings to the timer and pressure. It has been a true game changer for me.

customer_reviews.title: Nice press.  Good value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cheap heat press. Easy to use. Only negative is how far it opens, it could be wider to make it easier to load a garment.

customer_reviews.text: One of the best! Got this press to start my business two years ago and it’s still going strong! Highly recommend this if you are looking to start your tshirt business!

customer_reviews.text: WAS AN ABSOLUTE DISASTER FROM THE START! DIDNT EVEN HA E IT 24HRS BEFORE IT OVERHEATED AND MELTED THROUGH THR TEFLON AND BURNT ONE OF MY T SHIRTS. I COULDNT IMAGINE ALL OF THE PRESSES THEY SELL DOING THIS! HOWEVER THIS PARTICULAR UNIT I RECEIVED WAS DEFINITELY DEFECTIVE/AND A DUD!!!! 👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾

customer_reviews.title: Alright press.

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles and unstable
customer_reviews.text: When I took the heat press out of the box, I set it on the table and it wobbled. The back left corner doesn't touch the table like the other three corners. So when opening and closing the machine, it is unstable. I have sent it back and waiting on a replacement. I'll update this review after receiving the replacement product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The design is really nice and the machine's design is easier than my old ...
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to set the machine's temp/timer. I finally peeled back the covering for the LCD screen and saw that the buttons for the adjustment was too far back to work without removing the cover. I was then able to adjust the temp and time but it stopped working in the middle of doing that. The design is really nice and the machine's design is easier than my old machine but I could never get it to start up. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Sanicqua Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Coating peeling from hot plate after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: The heat press is fairly easy to use. The arm requires a bit of strength to lock it into place. I’m very disappointed because I haven’t even had it for 30 days yet, used it 5 or 6 times and the coating is already peeling off of the hot plate. It’s just continuing to get worse with each use.

customer_reviews.title: worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, manual leaves much to figure out on your own, but with youtube videos posted by other owners and a little bit of trial and error I have it figured out. Made my 1st 3 shirts this week, worked like a charm! :-D

The knob turns in both directions but will never lock down again. If you are only pressing shirts and don't have to change anything it works but don't ever turn the knob.

customer_reviews.text: What I got was not what was pictured, however, it works fine. Great starter heat press, though. Get a digital thermometer to make sure the temp. is what it says and google a bit to figure out how to work it (the included instructions are beyond useless).

customer_reviews.title: Great heat press!
customer_reviews.text: Going on six months and have expanded my small, local business to Etsy. Love this thing!!! I do wish it would have come with the piece of foam some buyers report they got with theirs under the red rubber mat, but oh well. It's a work horse!

customer_reviews.title: When I took it out of the box, the ...
customer_reviews.text: When I took it out of the box, the digital reader was not working properly but it is too much of a hassle to exchange. It works for what it's supposed to do. It does take a while to warm up and I do wonder about my electrical bill, so I save using the heat press for larger projects or when I have saved up enough projects to do at once.

customer_reviews.title: was rusted when openned box

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is easy to use. Haven't had any issues with it, usually keep it at 325 degrees for 30 seconds and the presses come out great. I've used it to press at least a hundred shirts, tea towels and koozies.

customer_reviews.text: I expanded my business with this. It doesn't cost much. It heats up quickly. It's not too heavy to lift. I'm not sure if the temp is accurate but I just bump up the temp anyhow and the job is done.

product_meta.title: Fancierstudio DG Digital Heat Press Industrial-Quality Digital 15-by-15-Inch Sublimation T-Shirt Heat Press, Black DG Heat Press Black Blue
feature_bullets: Fancierstudio DG Heat Press 15 inch by 15 inch heat press. Voltage: 110V (standard US and Canada) .Power: 1400 watts, Heat Press Style: Clamp shell, Temperature Range: 0 500 degrees F; Time Range:0 to 999 seconds, Electronic time and heat control; precise time set up, Silicon gel base board, Pressure adjustable. Teflon sheet included. Silicon pad lightly glued down not fully for purpose of replacement. Color of heat press is Blue Black Model: DG15X15 BB

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars273 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
